name: Termination Notice for Lease Agreement
shortDescription: The Lease/Rent agreement comes to an end when the lease period expires. Many times the tenant or landlord chooses to terminate the agreement before the expiration period.
description: The Lease/rent agreement comes to an end when the lease period is expired. Many times the tenant or landlord chooses to terminate the agreement before the expiration period. A termination notice is served to the other party two months prior to the termination period. It includes the reason for termination of agreement.

variations.name: Termination Notice for Lease Agreement - Document draft - Customize
description: First Draft delivered within 3 working days

variations.name: Termination Notice for Lease Agreement - Document Review
description: Document review and consult with the Lawyer
Redline version delivered within 8 working hours

howWeWork.heading: How to get a Termination Termination Notice drafted

content.title: Schedule Call with the Lawyer
content.description: Schedule Call and discuss with the Lawyer your Document drafting requirements

content.title: Get your Agreement Draft
content.description: Lawyer will deliver customized draft of the Document as per your requirement

content.title: Dedicated Lawyer Available
content.description: 60 Minutes of Talk time with the Lawyer for discussing requirements and changes in the draft

content.title: First Draft within 3 Days
content.description: First draft of the Document will be delivered within a maximum of 3 working days

content.title: Finalize Document
content.description: 2/3 Iterations per Document allowed to incorporate your suggestions/changes

content.title: Details of parties
content.description: The notice shall mention the details of the parties. Information like name, residential address shall be written in the notice.

content.title: Notice clause
content.description: The notice shall make a mention of the notice clause written in the lease agreement. This provides clarity to the receiver about the context of the notice.

content.title: Reason for termination
content.description: The notice shall prescribe the reason and grounds for termination of agreement.

content.title: Violation of lease agreement
content.description: The notice shall mention the prior violation of lease agreement by the parties.

content.title: Sender’s demand and request
content.description: The sender writes his demands and request in the notice.  The sender can ask for specific performance.
A notice provides for mutual settlement and negotiation for exiting the contract, saving expensive litigation costs.
Termination Notice can be used as a proof of contract termination during litigation (if arises later).

faqs.question: What is the minimum notice period for tenants?
faqs.answer: The minimum notice period for tenants is 1 month.

faqs.question: What is a termination clause?
faqs.answer: The termination clause in the agreement provides the notice period and grounds for termination of rental/ lease agreement.

faqs.question: What happens if someone doesn't respond to a termination notice?
faqs.answer: If the receiver does not respond to the notice in the stipulated time period, you can proceed with legal action.

faqs.question: I have a termination notice; how can I get it reviewed by a Lawyer?
faqs.answer: ezyLegal can help you get your legal notice reviewed and provide you with the right legal guidance. You can upload your document and schedule your Consultation with an ezyLegal Lawyer.

faqs.question: What is the process of getting the notice drafted from ezyLegal?
faqs.answer: ezyLegal offers Standard and Customized Document drafts. If you chose the customized Document option, your call will be scheduled with a Lawyer to whom you can explain your specific requirements. The first draft will be delivered within 2 working days and then you would be allowed 2-3 iterations to make changes in the draft.

faqs.question: How will the Document be delivered to me?
faqs.answer: The Document when ready will be available on the ezyLegal website (www.ezylegal.in) in your secured Account. You will be notified on email and WhatsApp whenever a new version of the Document is uploaded. You can Log-in and View or Download the document.  Copy of the documents delivered by ezyLegal will always be available in your ezyLegal account forever.
